about_me.title: About me
about_me.paragraph1: I love turning ideas into real projects. Coding gives me the same creative joy as cooking — experimenting, improving, and shaping things until they’re just right.
about_me.paragraph2: I’m based in Regensburg and fully open to remote or hybrid work—flexibility helps me do my best work.
about_me.paragraph3: I enjoy exploring new technologies and building up my skill set step by step—continuous learning keeps me motivated.
about_me.paragraph4: I learn something from every mistake I make. Think of it as my built-in upgrade system—I get a little better with each version.

skills.title: My skills
skills.description: I have hands-on experience with a variety of front-end tools — from JavaScript and Angular to Scrum — creating interactive and responsive user experiences.
skills.question: Looking for another skill?
skills.followup: Feel free to reach out — I’m always excited to learn new things.
